verses.verse: "My <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2254>broken,<s%> my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H2193>extinguished,<s%> The <S%H6913>grave<s%> is [ready] for me.
<S%H518>"Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2049>mockers<s%> are with me, And my <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H3885>gazes<s%> on their <S%H4784>provocation.<s%>
<S%H7760>"Lay<s%> <S%H7760>down,<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> a <S%H6162>pledge<s%> for me with Thyself; <S%H4310>Who<s%> is there that will be my <S%H8628>guarantor<s%> <S%H3027><s%>?
"For Thou hast <S%H6845>kept<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H7922>understanding;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> Thou wilt not <S%H7311>exalt<s%> [them.]
"He who <S%H5046>informs<s%> against <S%H7453>friends<s%> for a <S%H2506>share<s%> [of the spoil,] The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%> also shall <S%H3615>languish.<s%>
"But He has <S%H3322>made<s%> me a <S%H4914>byword<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> And I <S%H1961>am<s%> one at whom men <S%H8611>spit.<s%>
"My <S%H5869>eye<s%> has also <S%H3543>grown<s%> <S%H3543>dim<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of <S%H9213>grief,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3338>members<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow.<s%>
"The <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall be <S%H8074>appalled<s%> at <S%H384>this,<s%> And the <S%H9345>innocent<s%> shall <S%H5782>stir<s%> up himself <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H2611>godless.<s%>

"Nevertheless the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H270>hold<s%> to his <S%H1870>way,<s%> And he who has <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall <S%H3254>grow<s%> <S%H555>stronger<s%> and stronger.
"But <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you <S%H4994>now,<s%> For I do not <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> among you.
"My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H5674>past,<s%> my <S%H2154>plans<s%> are <S%H5423>torn<s%> <S%H5423>apart,<s%> [Even] the <S%H4180>wishes<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
<S%H518>"If<s%> I <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> as my <S%H1004>home,<s%> I <S%H7502>make<s%> my <S%H3326>bed<s%> in the <S%H2822>darkness;<s%>
If I <S%H7121>call<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> 'You are my father'; To the <S%H1>worm,<s%> 'my <S%H7415>mother<s%> and my <S%H517>sister<s%>';
"Will it <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with me to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>? Shall we <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5183>go<s%> <S%H5183>down<s%> into the <S%H6083>dust<s%>?"
